title: Add JSON-based issue workflow
body: Implement create, update and delete operations using a JSON file.

title: Implement OAuth2 login support
body: Allow users to authenticate via providers such as Google or GitHub.

title: Improve database schema for subtitle metadata
body: Design a richer schema to track subtitle sources and history.

title: Document protobuf regeneration steps
body: Add instructions for generating gRPC code from proto files.

title: Use provider SDKs instead of manual HTTP calls
body: Refactor provider integrations to use official or community SDKs.

title: Evaluate performance of merging and translation
body: Benchmark and optimise the merging and translation functions.

title: Implement asynchronous translation queue
body: Process heavy translation tasks using a worker queue.

title: Add optional cloud storage for subtitles
body: Allow storing subtitles and history in cloud providers such as S3.

title: Internationalise CLI and web interface
body: Provide translations for user-facing messages in the CLI and web UI.

title: Implement manual subtitle search
body: Allow searching and downloading subtitles on demand.

title: Track subtitle download history
body: Record where and when subtitles were obtained.

title: Support per-title language preferences
body: Configure desired subtitle languages per show or movie.

title: Automatic subtitle upgrades
body: Detect and fetch better quality subtitles when available.

title: Complete gRPC configuration API
body: Expose configuration management over authenticated gRPC.

title: Add configuration page to web interface
body: Allow editing of configuration files through the React UI.

title: Verify RBAC enforcement across Go and React
body: Ensure role based access control works in both backend and frontend.

title: Use unified API for React front end
body: React application should interact via the same gRPC API or REST fallback.

title: Increase test coverage across packages
body: Add unit tests for remaining packages to improve reliability.

title: Optimise database queries
body: Review indexes and query patterns for better performance.

title: Cache translations to avoid duplicates
body: Reuse existing results instead of re-translating identical subtitles.

title: Display progress updates in CLI and web UI
body: Show task progress for long running operations.
